casebody.data:
HALL
v.
U.S. XPRESS, INC., et al. 12P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2018

Mr. Matthew J. Ledwith, Attorney at Law, For U.S. Xpress, Inc., et al.

Mr. M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, For U.S. Xpress, Inc., et al.

Mr. R. James Lore, Attorney at Law, For Hall, Harrison.

Mr. James S. Aven, Attorney at Law, For Hall, Harrison.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of January 2018 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2018."
